languages.text: "В иное время в ином месте я бы немедля потребовала убить простолюдина за подобную выходку. Однако... Его разум плотно стискивают зелено-черные тернии, смотреть больно. Никогда не видела столь пугающего цвета. Этот человек, этот улей... насквозь пропитаны отчаянием".

traits.locale_text: "В иное время в ином месте я бы немедля потребовала убить простолюдина за подобную выходку. Однако... Его разум плотно стискивают зелено-черные тернии, смотреть больно. Никогда не видела столь пугающего цвета. Этот человек, этот улей... насквозь пропитаны отчаянием".

languages.text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."
languages.original_text: "В иное время в ином месте я бы немедля потребовала убить простолюдина за подобную выходку. Однако... Его разум плотно стискивают зелено-черные тернии, смотреть больно. Никогда не видела столь пугающего цвета. Этот человек, этот улей... насквозь пропитаны отчаянием".

traits.locale_text: "In a different time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outbust. And yet... It hurts me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening color. This person, this hive... Everything here is soaked with despair."

Never have I seen such a frightening color. This person, this hive... Everything here is soaked with despair."

Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

"In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

"In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

languages.text: “如果换做是其他情况，我会请求你立刻杀了这个农奴，因为他竟敢如此出言不逊。然而……我看到他的心灵被青黑色的荆棘紧紧地束缚着，这让我无比痛苦。我之前从没见过这么可怕的颜色。这个人，这座巢都……这里的一切，都充满了绝望的味道。”
languages.original_text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是其他情况，我会请求你立刻杀了这个农民，因为他竟敢如此出言不逊。然而……我看到他的心灵被青黑色的荆棘紧紧地束缚着，这让我无比痛苦。我之前从没见过这么可怕的颜色。这个人，这座巢都……这里的一切，都充满了绝望的味道。”

languages.text: «En otro momento y lugar exigiría de inmediato que eliminara al plebeyo por su arrebato, pero... me duele ver su mente torturada por espinas negras verdosas. Nunca había visto un color tan aterrador. Esta persona, esta colmena... todo está colmado de desesperación».
languages.original_text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

traits.locale_text: «En otro momento y lugar exigiría de inmediato que eliminara al plebeyo por su arrebato, pero... me duele ver su mente torturada por espinas negras verdosas. Nunca había visto un color tan aterrador. Esta persona, esta colmena... todo está colmado de desesperación».

languages.text: 「別の時、別の場所であれば、あたくしはこんな無礼な発言をした農民をその場で斬り捨てるよう命じていたでしょう。ですが…緑がかった黒い茨にぎりぎりと縛られているその心を見ると、あたくしも痛みを感じずにはいられません。こんな恐ろしい色を見るのは初めて。この人は、このハイヴは…ここの何もかもが、絶望に染まっています」
languages.original_text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

traits.locale_text: 「別の時、別の場所であれば、あたくしはこんな無礼な発言をした農民をその場で斬り捨てるよう命じていたでしょう。ですが…緑がかった黒い茨にぎりぎりと縛られているその心を見ると、あたくしも痛みを感じずにはいられません。こんな恐ろしい色を見るのは初めて。この人は、このハイヴは…ここの何もかもが、絶望に染まっています」

languages.text: « Dans d'autres circonstances, j'aurais immédiatement exigé que vous abattiez ce paysan pour avoir osé parler de la sorte, mais... son esprit piqué d'épines noires et vertes me fait beaucoup de peine. Je n'avais jamais vu une couleur aussi effrayante. Cette personne, cette ruche... Tout ici est imprégné de désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

traits.locale_text: « Dans d'autres circonstances, j'aurais immédiatement exigé que vous abattiez ce paysan pour avoir osé parler de la sorte, mais... son esprit piqué d'épines noires et vertes me fait beaucoup de peine. Je n'avais jamais vu une couleur aussi effrayante. Cette personne, cette ruche... Tout ici est imprégné de désespoir. »

languages.text: "Zu einer anderen Zeit und an einem anderen Ort würde ich Euch umgehend ersuchen, den Bauern für seinen Ausbruch niederzustrecken. Und dennoch ... schmerzt es mich, zu sehen, wie sein Geist von grünlich-schwarzen Dornen malträtiert wird. Ich habe noch nie eine so furchterregende Farbe gesehen. Diese Person, diese Makropole ... alles hier ertrinkt in Verzweiflung."
languages.original_text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

traits.locale_text: "Zu einer anderen Zeit und an einem anderen Ort würde ich Euch umgehend ersuchen, den Bauern für seinen Ausbruch niederzustrecken. Und dennoch ... schmerzt es mich, zu sehen, wie sein Geist von grünlich-schwarzen Dornen malträtiert wird. Ich habe noch nie eine so furchterregende Farbe gesehen. Diese Person, diese Makropole ... alles hier ertrinkt in Verzweiflung."

languages.text: "Başka bir yer ve zamanda olsak bu köylüyü davranışları yüzünden şuracıkta asmanızı isterdim. Gelgelelim... Zihninin yeşilimsi siyah dikenler yüzünden bulandığını görmek beni çok üzüyor. Hayatımda hiç bu kadar iğrenç bir renk görmemiştim. Bu kişi, bu kovan... Buradaki her şey çaresizlik içinde."
languages.original_text: "In another time and place I would immediately demand you cut the peasant down for such an outburst. And yet... It pains me to see his mind is so tightly constricted by greenish black thorns. Never have I seen such a frightening colour. This person, this hive... Everything here is drenched with despair."

traits.locale_text: "Başka bir yer ve zamanda olsak bu köylüyü davranışları yüzünden şuracıkta asmanızı emrederdim. Ama işte... Zihninin yeşilimsi siyah dikenler yüzünden bulandığını görmek beni çok üzüyor. Hayatımda hiç bu kadar iğrenç bir renk görmemiştim. Bu kişi, bu kovan... Buradaki her şey çaresizlik içinde."
